select `id`, code, name, sex, birthday, id_card, native_place, address, email, `type`, images, create_date, remark, score, user_id from user_info where 1 = 1
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.name},'%')
AND code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.code},'%')
AND type= #{userInfo.type}
AND id_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.idCard},'%')
order by create_date desc
